sentences.en: All our kin came to the family reunion.
sentences.cn: 我们的亲属全都参加了这次家庭团聚会.

sentences.en: Better be blamed by our kith and kin, than be kissed by the enemy.
sentences.cn: 宁可让亲人责备, 切勿让敌人亲吻.

sentences.en: He is the next of my kin.
He's my kin , ie related to me.
No, he's neither kith nor kin to me.
sentences.cn: 不是, 他和我非亲非眷.

sentences.en: The sunflower blushed to own the nameless flower as her kin.
sentences.cn: 向日葵羞于把无名的花朵看作它的同胞.

sentences.en: They should be with their blood kin.
sentences.cn: 他们本来应该同他们的亲骨肉住在一起.

sentences.en: They were of a brotherhood bound together by the ties of kin.
sentences.cn: 他们是靠血缘关系结合起来的同胞.

sentences.en: This bond of kin represented the real basis of the confederacy.
sentences.cn: 这种血缘亲属关系是联盟的真实基础。

sentences.en: We are near kin , ie closely related.
We have notified the next of kin.
sentences.cn: 我们已经通知了最近的亲属。

sentences.en: We’ll have to notify the next of kin of his death.
sentences.cn: 我们得把他去世的消息通知他的直系亲属。

sentences.en: What kin is he to you?
Your cousin is also kin to me.
sentences.cn: 你的堂兄也是我的亲戚.

words.tran_cn: [法] 亲属关系，家属关系；亲密关系
同类的；有亲属关系的；性质类似的

phrases.tran_cn: 最近的血亲，最亲的亲戚

trans.tran_cn: 同类的；有亲属关系的；性质类似的
